name: Delirious Demeanor of the Sacred Lord
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  It was in that era that the first human to ascend arose from the throne toenter the Sacred Flame, while the mortal world awaited the arrival of theirsuccessor.  It was also the era that the mastermind took up the reins of all authority intheir stead.  Unfortunately, this self-proclaimed Sacred Lord, this usurper who believedthat the god he had loved and shed golden tears for should forever remain theone and only — overstepped his authority. Placing selfish desire above thecommandments left by that revered god, he established a city in which theheavens and the earth were separated from one another.
